verses.verse: And He began <S%G757><s%> to teach <S%G1321><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> by the sea. <S%G2281><s%> And such a very <S%G4183><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> gathered <S%G4863><s%> to Him that He got <S%G1684><s%> into a boat <S%G4143><s%> in the sea <S%G2281><s%> and sat <S%G2521><s%> down; <S%G2521><s%> and the whole <S%G3956><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> was by the sea <S%G2281><s%> on the land. <S%G1093><s%>
And He was teaching <S%G1321><s%> them many <S%G4183><s%> things <S%G4183><s%> in parables, <S%G3850><s%> and was saying <S%G3004><s%> to them in His teaching, <S%G1322><s%>
"Listen <S%G191><s%> [to this]! Behold, <S%G2400><s%> the sower <S%G4687><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out to sow; <S%G4687><s%>

and it came <S%G1096><s%> about that as he was sowing, <S%G4687><s%> some <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3303><s%> [seed] fell <S%G4098><s%> beside <S%G3844><s%> the road, <S%G3598><s%> and the birds <S%G4071><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and ate <S%G2719><s%> it up.

"And other <S%G243><s%> [seed] fell <S%G4098><s%> on the rocky <S%G4075><s%> [ground] where <S%G3699><s%> it did not have <S%G2192><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> soil; <S%G1093><s%> and immediately <S%G2117><s%> it sprang <S%G1816><s%> up because <S%G1223><s%> it had <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> depth <S%G899><s%> of soil. <S%G1093><s%>

"And after <S%G3753><s%> the sun <S%G2246><s%> had risen, <S%G393><s%> it was scorched; <S%G2739><s%> and because <S%G1223><s%> it had <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> root, <S%G4491><s%> it withered <S%G3583><s%> away. <S%G3583><s%>

"And other <S%G243><s%> [seed] fell <S%G4098><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> the thorns, <S%G173><s%> and the thorns <S%G173><s%> came <S%G305><s%> up and choked <S%G4846><s%> it, and it yielded <S%G1325><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> crop. <S%G2590><s%>

"And other <S%G243><s%> [seeds] fell <S%G4098><s%> into the good <S%G2570><s%> soil <S%G1093><s%> and as they grew <S%G305><s%> up and increased, <S%G837><s%> they yielded <S%G1325><s%> a crop <S%G2590><s%> and produced <S%G5342><s%> thirty, <S%G5144><s%> sixty, <S%G1835><s%> and a hundredfold. <S%G1540><s%>"
And He was saying, <S%G3004><s%> "He who <S%G3739><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> ears <S%G3775><s%> to hear, <S%G191><s%> let him hear. <S%G191><s%>"

And as soon <S%G3753><s%> as He was alone, <S%G3441><s%> His followers, <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4012><s%> along <S%G4862><s%> with the twelve, <S%G1427><s%> [began] asking <S%G2065><s%> Him [about] the parables. <S%G3850><s%>

And He was saying <S%G3004><s%> to them, "To you has been given <S%G1325><s%> the mystery <S%G3466><s%> of the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%> but those <S%G1565><s%> who are outside <S%G1854><s%> get <S%G1096><s%> everything <S%G3956><s%> in parables, <S%G3850><s%>

in order <S%G2443><s%> that while seeing, <S%G991><s%> they may see <S%G991><s%> and not perceive; <S%G3708><s%> and while hearing, <S%G191><s%> they may hear <S%G191><s%> and not understand <S%G4920><s%> lest <S%G3379><s%> they return <S%G1994><s%> and be forgiven. <S%G863><s%> "

And He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Do you not understand <S%G3609><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> parable <S%G3850><s%>? And how <S%G4459><s%> will you understand <S%G1097><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the parables <S%G3850><s%>?
"The sower <S%G4687><s%> sows <S%G4687><s%> the word. <S%G3056><s%>

"And these <S%G3778><s%> are the ones who <S%G3588><s%> are beside <S%G3844><s%> the road <S%G3598><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> is sown; <S%G4687><s%> and when <S%G3752><s%> they hear, <S%G191><s%> immediately <S%G2117><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> and takes <S%G142><s%> away <S%G142><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> which has been sown <S%G4687><s%> in them.

"And in a similar <S%G3668><s%> way <S%G3668><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> are the ones on whom seed was sown <S%G4687><s%> on the rocky <S%G4075><s%> [places,] who, <S%G3739><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> they hear <S%G191><s%> the word, <S%G3056><s%> immediately <S%G2117><s%> receive <S%G2983><s%> it with joy; <S%G5479><s%>

and they have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> [firm] root <S%G4491><s%> in themselves, <S%G1438><s%> but are [only] temporary; <S%G4340><s%> then, <S%G1534><s%> when affliction <S%G2347><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> persecution <S%G1375><s%> arises <S%G1096><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of the word, <S%G3056><s%> immediately <S%G2117><s%> they fall <S%G4624><s%> away. <S%G4624><s%>

"And others <S%G243><s%> are the ones on whom seed was sown <S%G4687><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> the thorns; <S%G173><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> are the ones who have heard <S%G191><s%> the word, <S%G3056><s%>

and the worries <S%G3308><s%> of the world, <S%G165><s%> and the deceitfulness <S%G539><s%> of riches, <S%G4149><s%> and the desires <S%G1939><s%> for other <S%G3062><s%> things <S%G3062><s%> enter <S%G1531><s%> in and choke <S%G4846><s%> the word, <S%G3056><s%> and it becomes <S%G1096><s%> unfruitful. <S%G175><s%>

"And those <S%G1565><s%> are the ones on whom seed was sown <S%G4687><s%> on the good <S%G2570><s%> soil; <S%G1093><s%> and they hear <S%G191><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> and accept <S%G3858><s%> it, and bear <S%G2592><s%> fruit, <S%G2592><s%> thirty, <S%G5144><s%> sixty, <S%G1835><s%> and a hundredfold. <S%G1540><s%>"

And He was saying <S%G3004><s%> to them, "A lamp <S%G3088><s%> is not brought <S%G2064><s%> to be put <S%G5087><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> a peck-measure, is it, or <S%G2228><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> a bed <S%G2825><s%>? Is it not [brought] to be put <S%G5087><s%> on the lampstand <S%G3087><s%>?

"For nothing <S%G3756><s%> <S%G5100><s%> is hidden, <S%G2927><s%> except <S%G1437><s%> to be revealed; <S%G5319><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> has [anything] been <S%G1096><s%> secret, <S%G614><s%> but that it should come <S%G2064><s%> to light. <S%G5318><s%>
"If <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G5100><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> ears <S%G3775><s%> to hear, <S%G191><s%> let him hear. <S%G191><s%>"

And He was saying <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Take <S%G991><s%> care <S%G991><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> you listen <S%G191><s%> to. By your standard <S%G3358><s%> of measure <S%G3354><s%> it shall be measured <S%G3354><s%> to you; and more <S%G4369><s%> shall be given <S%G4369><s%> you besides. <S%G4369><s%>

"For whoever <S%G3739><s%> has, <S%G2192><s%> to him shall [more] be given; <S%G1325><s%> and whoever <S%G3739><s%> does not have, <S%G2192><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> he has <S%G2192><s%> shall be taken <S%G142><s%> away <S%G142><s%> from him."

And He was saying, <S%G3004><s%> "The kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is like <S%G3779><s%> <S%G5613><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> who casts <S%G906><s%> seed <S%G4703><s%> upon the soil; <S%G1093><s%>

and goes <S%G2518><s%> to bed <S%G2518><s%> at night <S%G3571><s%> and gets <S%G1453><s%> up by day, <S%G2250><s%> and the seed <S%G4703><s%> sprouts <S%G985><s%> up and grows <S%G3373><s%> â€“ how, <S%G5613><s%> he himself <S%G846><s%> does not know. <S%G3609><s%>

"The soil <S%G1093><s%> produces <S%G2592><s%> crops <S%G2592><s%> by itself; <S%G844><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> the blade, <S%G5528><s%> then <S%G7508><s%> the head, <S%G4719><s%> then <S%G7508><s%> the mature <S%G4134><s%> grain <S%G4621><s%> in the head. <S%G4719><s%>

"But when <S%G3752><s%> the crop <S%G2590><s%> permits, <S%G3860><s%> he immediately <S%G2117><s%> puts <S%G649><s%> in the sickle, <S%G1407><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> the harvest <S%G2326><s%> has come. <S%G3936><s%>"

And He said, <S%G3004><s%> "How <S%G4459><s%> shall we picture <S%G3666><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> by what <S%G5101><s%> parable <S%G3850><s%> shall we present <S%G5087><s%> it?

"[It is] like <S%G5613><s%> a mustard <S%G4615><s%> seed, <S%G2848><s%> which, <S%G3739><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> sown <S%G4687><s%> upon the soil, <S%G1093><s%> though it is smaller <S%G3398><s%> than all <S%G3956><s%> the seeds <S%G4690><s%> that are upon the soil, <S%G1093><s%>

yet <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> it is sown, <S%G4687><s%> grows <S%G305><s%> up and becomes <S%G1096><s%> larger <S%G3173><s%> than all <S%G3956><s%> the garden <S%G3001><s%> plants <S%G3001><s%> and forms <S%G4160><s%> large <S%G3173><s%> branches; <S%G2798><s%> so <S%G5620><s%> that the birds <S%G4071><s%> of the air <S%G3772><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> nest <S%G2681><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> its shade. <S%G4639><s%> "
And with many <S%G4183><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> parables <S%G3850><s%> He was speaking <S%G2980><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> to them as they were able <S%G1410><s%> to hear <S%G191><s%> it;

and He did not speak <S%G2980><s%> to them without <S%G5565><s%> a parable; <S%G3850><s%> but He was explaining <S%G1956><s%> everything <S%G3956><s%> privately <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2398><s%> to His own <S%G2398><s%> disciples. <S%G3101><s%>

And on that day, <S%G2250><s%> when evening <S%G3798><s%> had come, <S%G1096><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Let us go <S%G1330><s%> over <S%G1330><s%> to the other <S%G4008><s%> side. <S%G4008><s%>"

And leaving <S%G863><s%> the multitude, <S%G3793><s%> they took <S%G3880><s%> Him along <S%G3880><s%> with them, just <S%G5613><s%> as He was, in the boat; <S%G4143><s%> and other <S%G243><s%> boats <S%G4143><s%> were with Him.

And there arose <S%G1096><s%> a fierce <S%G3173><s%> gale <S%G2978><s%> of wind, <S%G417><s%> and the waves <S%G2949><s%> were breaking <S%G1911><s%> over <S%G1911><s%> the boat <S%G4143><s%> so <S%G5620><s%> much that the boat <S%G4143><s%> was already <S%G2235><s%> filling <S%G1072><s%> up.

And He Himself <S%G846><s%> was in the stern, <S%G4403><s%> asleep <S%G2518><s%> on the cushion; <S%G4344><s%> and they awoke <S%G1453><s%> Him and said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> do You not care <S%G3199><s%> that we are perishing <S%G622><s%>?"

And being aroused, <S%G1326><s%> He rebuked <S%G2008><s%> the wind <S%G417><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to the sea, <S%G2281><s%> "Hush, <S%G4623><s%> be still. <S%G5392><s%>" And the wind <S%G417><s%> died <S%G2869><s%> down <S%G2869><s%> and it became <S%G1096><s%> perfectly <S%G3173><s%> calm. <S%G1055><s%>
And He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Why <S%G5101><s%> are you so <S%G3779><s%> timid <S%G1169><s%>? How <S%G4459><s%> is it that you have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>?"

And they became very <S%G3173><s%> much <S%G3173><s%> afraid <S%G5399><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to one <S%G240><s%> another, <S%G240><s%> "Who <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G686><s%> is this, <S%G3778><s%> that even <S%G2532><s%> the wind <S%G417><s%> and the sea <S%G2281><s%> obey <S%G5219><s%> Him?"
